Rep.ReportSql: SELECT tid.Id, tid.trafficId, tid.carplateFull, tid.carplateAsi, tid.etcNo, tid.capTime, tid.capImg, tid.nodeName, tid.nodeId, tid.nodeType, CASE tid.nodeType WHEN 1 THEN '入口' WHEN 2 THEN '出口' ELSE '场内' END AS nodeTypeName, tid.carStyleName, tid.carStyle, tid.carTypeName, tid.carType, tid.carColor, tid.plateColor, tid.carLogo, tid.remark, tid.serialNo, tid.recogEnable, tid.multiRecog, IFNULL(tsc2.TypeName,'') AS multiRecogName, tid.passType, IFNULL(tsc.TypeName,'') AS passTypeName, tid.passReason, IFNULL(tsc1.TypeName,'') AS passReasonName FROM t_inout_detail tid LEFT JOIN t_sys_config tsc ON tid.passType = tsc.TypeValue AND tsc.MainType=0 LEFT JOIN t_sys_config tsc1 ON tid.passType = tsc1.MainType AND tsc1.TypeValue = tid.passReason LEFT JOIN t_sys_config tsc2 ON tid.multiRecog = tsc2.TypeValue AND tsc2.MainType=4 WHERE @Param
Rep.TotalSql: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_inout_detail tid WHERE @Param

Rep.ReportSql: SELECT ttd.id , ttd.trafficId, ttd.carplateFull, ttd.carplateAsi, ttd.etcNo, ttd.carTypeName, ttd.carStyleName, ttd.comeTime, ttd.comePlace, ttd.comeImage, ttd.outTime, ttd.outPlace, ttd.outImage, ttd.remark, ttd.createTime, CASE WHEN ttd.comeTime='' OR ttd.outTime='' THEN ' ' ELSE f_Get_SecToTime(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,ttd.comeTime,ttd.outTime)) END AS ParkTime, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tod.payMoney/100),0) FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE tod.trafficId=ttd.trafficId AND tod.trafficId>0) AS payMoney, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tod.ticketMoney/100),0) FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE tod.trafficId=ttd.trafficId AND tod.trafficId>0) AS ticketMoney, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tod.ticketTime/100),0) FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE tod.trafficId=ttd.trafficId AND tod.trafficId>0) AS ticketTime, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tod.freeMoney/100),0) FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE tod.trafficId=ttd.trafficId AND tod.trafficId>0) AS freeMoney FROM t_traffic_detail ttd WHERE @Param
Rep.TotalSql: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_traffic_detail ttd WHERE @Param

Rep.ReportSql: SELECT tod.id, tod.trafficId, tod.carplateFull, tod.etcNo, tod.carplateAsi, tod.orderNo, tod.busOrderNo, DATE_FORMAT(tod.comeTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS comeTime, tod.comeImage, ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2) AS payMoney, ROUND(tod.chargeMoney/100,2) AS chargeMoney, ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,2) AS ticketMoney, tod.ticketTime, tod.ticketCount, ROUND(tod.freeMoney/100,2) AS freeMoney, tod.remark, tod.payTime, tod.createTime, tod.payPlatforme, tod.payType, tod.payMethod, IFNULL(tpt.TypeName,'其他') AS platName, IFNULL(tpt2.TypeName,'其他') AS payTypeName, IFNULL(tpt3.TypeName,'其他') AS payMethodName FROM t_order_detail tod LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt ON tod.payPlatforme = tpt.TypeValue AND tpt.MainType=1 LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt2 ON tod.payType = tpt2.TypeValue AND tpt2.MainType=2 LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt3 ON tod.payMethod = tpt3.TypeValue AND tpt3.MainType=3 WHERE @Param
Rep.TotalSql: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE @Param
Rep.FootSql:
SELECT '合计' AS trafficId, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(tod.payMoney,0))/100,2) AS payMoney, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(tod.ticketMoney,0))/100,2) AS ticketMoney, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(tod.ticketTime,0))/100,2) AS ticketTime, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(tod.freeMoney,0))/100,2) AS freeMoney, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(tod.chargeMoney,0))/100,2) AS chargeMoney
FROM t_order_detail tod WHERE @Param

Rep.ReportSql: SELECT UUID() AS Id, DATE_FORMAT(tod.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS payTime, tod.incomeType, CASE tod.incomeType WHEN 1 THEN '临停缴费' WHEN 2 THEN '固定车续费' WHEN 3 THEN '商家充值' END AS incomeName, tod.payPlatforme, tpt.TypeName AS platName, tod.payType, IFNULL(tpt2.TypeName,'其他') AS payTypeName, ROUND(tod.chargeMoney/100,2) AS chargeMoney, ROUND(tod.refundMoney/100,2) AS refundMoney, -- (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ROUND(tr.paiddata/100,2)),0) FROM t_refundorder tr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tr.refundTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(tod.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AND tod.payPlatforme=2000 AND tod.payType=1004) AS refundMoney, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1001', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1001, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1002', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1002, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1003', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1003, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1004', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1004, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1005', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1005, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1006', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1006, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1007', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1007, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1008', CONCAT(ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),'元|',ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,1),'小时'), 0)) AS PM_1008, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1009', CONCAT(ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),'元|',ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,1),'小时'), 0)) AS PM_1009, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1010', CONCAT(ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),'元|',ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,1),'小时'), 0)) AS PM_1010, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1011', CONCAT(ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),'元|',ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,1),'小时'), 0)) AS PM_1011, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1012', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1012, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1013', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1013, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1014', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1014, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1015', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1015, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1016', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1016, MAX(IF(tod.payMethod = '1017', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1017, SUM(ROUND((tod.payMoney-tod.refundMoney)/100,2)) AS subTotal, (SELECT SUM(ROUND((tod1.payMoney-tod1.refundMoney)/100,2)) FROM t_order_daily tod1 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tod1.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(tod.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS totalMoney FROM t_order_daily tod LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt ON tod.payPlatforme=tpt.TypeValue AND tpt.MainType=1 AND tpt.IsDelete=0 LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt2 ON tod.payType=tpt2.TypeValue AND tpt2.MainType=2 AND tpt2.IsDelete=0 WHERE @Param GROUP BY tod.payTime,tod.incomeType,tod.payPlatforme,tod.payType
Rep.TotalSql: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM ( SELECT tod.payTime FROM t_order_daily tod LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt ON tod.payPlatforme=tpt.TypeValue AND tpt.MainType=1 AND tpt.IsDelete=0 LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt2 ON tod.payType=tpt2.TypeValue AND tpt2.MainType=2 AND tpt2.IsDelete=0 WHERE @Param GROUP BY tod.payTime,tod.payPlatforme,tod.payType ) AS A
Rep.FootSql:
SELECT '合计' AS payTime,
SUM(ROUND(tod.chargeMoney/100,2)) AS chargeMoney, SUM(ROUND(tod.refundMoney/100,2)) AS refundMoney, -- (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ROUND(tr.paiddata/100,2)),0) FROM t_refundorder tr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tr.refundTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(tod.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS refundMoney, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1001', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1001, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1002', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1002, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1003', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1003, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1004', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1004, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1005', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1005, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1006', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1006, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1007', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1007, CAST(CONCAT(SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1008', ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),0)),'元|' ,SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1008', ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,2),0)),'小时') AS CHAR) AS PM_1008, CAST(CONCAT(SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1009', ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),0)),'元|' ,SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1009', ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,2),0)),'小时') AS CHAR) AS PM_1009, CAST(CONCAT(SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1010', ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),0)),'元|' ,SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1010', ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,2),0)),'小时') AS CHAR) AS PM_1010, CAST(CONCAT(SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1011', ROUND(tod.ticketMoney/100,1),0)),'元|' ,SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1011', ROUND(tod.ticketTime/3600,2),0)),'小时') AS CHAR) AS PM_1011, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1012', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1012, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1013', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1013, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1014', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1014, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1015', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1015, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1016', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1016, SUM(IF(tod.payMethod = '1017', ROUND(tod.payMoney/100,2), 0)) AS PM_1017, SUM(ROUND((tod.payMoney-tod.refundMoney)/100,2)) AS subTotal, SUM(ROUND((tod.payMoney-tod.refundMoney)/100,2)) AS totalMoney FROM t_order_daily tod LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt ON tod.payPlatforme=tpt.TypeValue AND tpt.MainType=1 AND tpt.IsDelete=0 LEFT JOIN t_plat_type tpt2 ON tod.payType=tpt2.TypeValue AND tpt2.MainType=2 AND tpt2.IsDelete=0 WHERE @Param
